Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You need an Android phone with EasyThings App installed. After adding all the devices to the EasyThings App, select Local network in [More > Change network], enable the gateway in [More > Network setup]. You need to ensure the status of the gateway is connected. Sync your devices to the cloud in [More > Cloud setup]. NOTE that make sure the EasyThings App is running in the foreground or background.

Enable Easythings Skill in Alexa App, sign in with the same account as EasyThings App, discover devices by Echo or Alexa App, and then you can control the devices by Echo or Alexa App.

This skill can control the lights in the gateway, change the on/off, brightness and color.
